decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of the original planning permission 00177/29/P7 dated 20/06/2017.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (BR_123 Rev A, BR_126 Rev C, and BR_128 Rev C, received: 11/12/2017. BR-102 Rev D and BR_125 Rev D received: 18/01/2018.
BR-127 Rev E received: 05/02/2018.
Drawings approved under original permission 00177/29/P7 dated 20/06/2017: BR-103, BR-104, BR-105, BR-106, BR-107, BR_122, Basement Construction Statement, Sunlight & Daylight Analysis dated 13/07/2015 received: 26/04/2017. BR_124 Rev C received: 15/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions and boundary treatment hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.

Condition : 7 - The roof area of the single storey extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 9 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Condition : 10 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
Condition : 11 - The construction shall be carried out in accordance with the approved Construction Method Statement.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow changes to the front garden wall and the rear extension doors and walls of planning permission 00177/29/P7 approved 20/06/2017 for the Erection of a part single part two storey replacement rear extension with roof lanterns, enlargement of existing basement with two front, one side and two rear lightwells, and side access stairwell, erection of two rear roof extensions with five rooflights, additional rear and side windows and side doors to the house.
